heading: HR02238
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON NATURAL RESOURCES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE DEATHS OF MORE THAN 90 PEOPLE IN ITOGON, BENGUET AND THE FEARED DEATH OF ALMOST 100 PEOPLE IN NAGA, CEBU DUE TO LANDSLIDES TRIGGERED BY THE ONSLAUGHT OF TYPHOON OMPONG AND OTHER EXTREME WEATHER EVENTS SAID TO BE CAUSED BY LARGE-SCALE MINING AND QUARRYING ACTIVITIES IN THE AREA
principal-authors: ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-11-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02238
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON NATURAL RESOURCES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE DEATHS OF MORE THAN 90 PEOPLE IN ITOGON, BENGUET AND THE FEARED DEATH OF ALMOST 100 PEOPLE IN NAGA, CEBU DUE TO LANDSLIDES TRIGGERED BY THE ONSLAUGHT OF TYPHOON OMPONG AND OTHER EXTREME WEATHER EVENTS SAID TO BE CAUSED BY LARGE-SCALE MINING AND QUARRYING ACTIVITIES IN THE AREA
